mapper.insert: insert into tp_apply (name, mobile, type, status, reason) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tp_apply set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, mobile, type, status, reason from tp_apply
